00018 #ifndef __TLM_QUANTUMKEEPER_H__
00019 #define __TLM_QUANTUMKEEPER_H__
00020 
00021 namespace tlm_qk_dummy {
00022 
00023   template <typename Dummy>
00024   class tlm_quantumkeeper
00025   {
00026   public:
00027     static void setGlobalQuantum(const sc_core::sc_time& t)
00028     {
00029       mGlobalQuantum = t;
00030     }
00031   
00032     static const sc_core::sc_time& getGlobalQuantum() 
00033     {
00034       return mGlobalQuantum;
00035     }
00036   
00037   public:
00038     tlm_quantumkeeper() :
00039       mLocalTime(sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME)
00040     {
00041       computeLocalQuantum();
00042     }
00043 
00044     virtual ~tlm_quantumkeeper() {}
00045   
00046     void inc(const sc_core::sc_time& t)
00047     {
00048       mLocalTime += t;
00049     }
00050   
00051     bool needSync() const
00052     {
00053       return mLocalTime >= mLocalQuantum;
00054     }
00055   
00056     void reset()
00057     {
00058       mLocalTime = sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME;
00059       computeLocalQuantum();
00060     }
00061   
00062     sc_core::sc_time getCurrentTime() const
00063     {
00064       return sc_core::sc_time_stamp() + mLocalTime;
00065     }
00066   
00067     const sc_core::sc_time& getLocalTime() const
00068     {
00069       return mLocalTime;
00070     }
00071   
00072     sc_core::sc_time& getLocalTime()
00073     {
00074       return mLocalTime;
00075     }
00076   
00077     void sync()
00078     {
00079       sc_core::wait(mLocalTime);
00080       reset();
00081     }
00082   
00083   protected:
00084     virtual void computeLocalQuantum()
00085     {
00086       if (mGlobalQuantum != sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME) {
00087         const sc_core::sc_time currentTime = sc_core::sc_time_stamp();
00088         sc_dt::int64 tmp = static_cast<sc_dt::int64>(currentTime / mGlobalQuantum);
00089         const sc_core::sc_time remainder = (tmp + 1) * mGlobalQuantum - currentTime;
00090         mLocalQuantum = remainder;
00091 
00092       } else {
00093         mLocalQuantum = sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME;
00094       }
00095     }
00096   
00097   private:
00098     static sc_core::sc_time mGlobalQuantum;
00099   
00100   private:
00101     sc_core::sc_time mLocalQuantum;
00102     sc_core::sc_time mLocalTime;
00103   };
00104   
00105   template <typename Dummy>
00106   sc_core::sc_time tlm_quantumkeeper<Dummy>::mGlobalQuantum = sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME;
00107 
00108   struct tlm_dummy {};
00109 } // namespace tlm_qk_dummy
00110 
00111 namespace tlm {
00112 typedef ::tlm_qk_dummy::tlm_quantumkeeper< ::tlm_qk_dummy::tlm_dummy >
00113   tlm_quantumkeeper;
00114 
00115 } // namespace tlm

00117 #endif
